title: Letter to Certain Congressional Committees on the Annual Report on the Legal and Policy Frameworks Guiding the United States' Use of Military Force and Related National Security Operations | The White House
content: Dear Mr. Chairman:  (Dear Madam Chair:) (Dear Madam Chairwoman:)In accordance with section 1264 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115-91), as amended, 50 U.S.C. 1549(a), I am transmitting the annual report on the legal and policy frameworks guiding the United States’ use of military force and related national security operations.I am enclosing a copy of the unclassified report, as well as its classified annex.                               Sincerely,                               JOSEPH R. BIDEN JR.View the unclassified report here.
